page.title: 15Life Style.
page.content: {Fashion}The clothes that boys like wearing are baggy trousers and tracksuits.The top names in sport wear are Lecoste,Elesse,Fila,Leshark,Head, Capa,Sergio Tacicni,Rusini,and Pringle,Piere Cardin, Lyle and Scott ,Farah and Mirage.Girls like wearing trendy clothes but suprisingly tee-shirts seem to be the most popular .Jeans are also popular as most people like wearing them as casual clothes.Also skirts seem to be popular .Fashion is an important part of life nowadays .Pop-stars like boy George think themselves fashionable.Earings also play an important part in todays fashion. {Make up}Girls like wearing make-up pink is quite popular . People like wearing a make-up mix like purple and blue .The nail varnish worn is mainly pink but some wear illuminous colours.
